files.patch:
@@ -100,2 +100,1 @@
-              libxrandr-dev${{ inputs.apt-architecture }} libxtst-dev${{ inputs.apt-architecture }} \
-              libcups2-dev${{ inputs.apt-architecture }} libasound2-dev${{ inputs.apt-architecture }}
+              libxrandr-dev libxtst-dev libcups2-dev libasound2-dev

@@ -51,3 +51,0 @@
-      apt-add-architecture:
-        required: false
-        type: string
@@ -90,0 +87,8 @@
+      - name: 'Set architecture'
+        id: arch
+        run: |
+          # Set a proper suffix for packages if using a different architecture
+          if [[ '${{ inputs.apt-architecture }}' != '' ]]; then
+            echo '::set-output name=suffix:::${{ inputs.apt-architecture }}'
+          fi
+
@@ -94,1 +99,3 @@
-          ${{ inputs.apt-add-architecture }}
+          if [[ '${{ inputs.apt-architecture }}' != '' ]]; then
+            sudo dpkg --add-architecture ${{ inputs.apt-architecture }}
+          fi
@@ -97,1 +104,1 @@
-          sudo apt-get install gcc-${{ inputs.apt-gcc-version }} g++-${{ inputs.apt-gcc-version }} libxrandr-dev${{ inputs.apt-architecture }} libxtst-dev${{ inputs.apt-architecture }} libcups2-dev${{ inputs.apt-architecture }} libasound2-dev${{ inputs.apt-architecture }} ${{ inputs.apt-extra-packages }}
+          sudo apt-get install gcc-${{ inputs.apt-gcc-version }} g++-${{ inputs.apt-gcc-version }} libxrandr-dev${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} libxtst-dev${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} libcups2-dev${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} libasound2-dev${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} ${{ inputs.apt-extra-packages }}
